meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a schoolboy.
meanings.sent1: His schoolboyish enthusiasm for dinosaurs was contagious.
meanings.sent2: The boy's schoolboyish haircut made him look younger than his age.
meanings.sent3: She teased him about his schoolboyish crush on the teacher.
meanings.sent4: His schoolboyish grin lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The old photo captured his schoolboyish charm perfectly.

meanings.definition: Immature or childish in behavior, typical of a schoolboy.
meanings.sent1: His schoolboyish pranks often got him in trouble.
meanings.sent2: The group of friends engaged in schoolboyish banter during recess.
meanings.sent3: Even as adults, they couldn't resist a game of schoolboyish hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: Her schoolboyish giggles echoed through the hallway.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed the villain with a schoolboyish petulance.
